message: I understand you want a larger share, but a 55/45 split seems more reasonable for the start. Think about the shrinking pot!
Meet in the middle of our previous offers, 58% for me is the lowest I can go for now
Alice, the clock is ticking and we're both losing money! I'm meeting you closer to the middle, 52/48 split. Let's be logical and seal the deal before inflation eats our profits.
I see you're getting closer to my target, but 57% is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the pot's shrinking fast
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're down to the wire, and splitting 50/50 is the ONLY fair deal at this point.  Take it or leave it - any more stalling and we BOTH lose out!
